/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/obj_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl.dir/source_files/Light.cpp.o  -o opengl  -lglut -lglfw -lGLEW -lGL -lGLU -lm
